verifyEmail.title:
Kuhle lokho, iphrofayela yakho iphelele.
Manje sidinga ukuthi uqinisekise ikheli lakho le-imeyili ngokuchofoza isixhumanisi ku-imeyili esisanda kukuthumelela yona.
Ngemva kwalokho ungaqala ukwakha ipulazi lakho.
verifyEmail.title2:
Ungabuka futhi uhlele iphrofayela yakho nganoma yisiphi isikhathi ngokuchofoza isithonjana sephrofayela phezulu kwesokudla sesikrini.
Uma i-imeyili ingakafiki vele uchofoze okuthi 'thumela kabusha'

profileImage.title: Sicela uhlole ama-imeyili akho ukuze uqinisekise ikheli lakho le-imeyili ngaphambi kokuqhubeka - uma ungakwazi ukuwubona umlayezo wethu wokuqinisekisa ungase ube kufolda yakho yogaxekile noma yomlayezo ongafuneki.
profileImage.title2: Khetha isithombe se-FarmSmarter noma layisha isithombe sakho sephrofayela lapha.
profileImage.selectImage: sicela ukhethe i-avatar ye-Farmsmarter noma ulayishe isithombe sakho sephrofayela ukuze uqhubeke.

farmName.title: Ukusetha ipulazi lakho sidinga imininingwane embalwa ukuze siqiniseke ukuthi sikunikeza izeluleko ezingcono kakhulu
farmName.title2: Ake siqale ngokunikeza ipulazi lakho igama.

farmSetup.title: ukumiswa kwepulazi
farmSetup.title2: Ngokuqinisekisa isimo sakho sobunikazi bomhlaba singakusekela ekubhaliseni umhlaba wakho nasekutholeni izimali ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
farmSetup.selectError: sicela ukhethe isimo sobunikazi bepulazi ukuze uqhubeke.

farmMap.title: Ingabe lena indawo elungile yepulazi lakho? Uma kungenjalo, ungabamba futhi uhudule iphinikhodi yemephu endaweni efanele kumephu. Sizosebenzisa le ndawo ukulethwa kwepulazi kanye nokuqoqwa kamuva.

app.notloggeds: Sicela ungene ngemvume noma ubhalise ukuze wakhe iphrofayela yakho yasepulazini.

home.farmNotFound: Awukabi nalo ipulazi â€“ manje ungakwazi ukwengeza ipulazi lakho lokuqala.
home.deleteMsg: Lokhu kuzosusa unomphela zonke izinkambu, amamephu, izitshalo nomlando ohlotshaniswa nepulazi lakho.
home.title: Lena ideshibhodi yakho yepulazi yomuntu siqu lapho ungafinyelela khona ulwazi mayelana, futhi udale amapulazi amasha.
home.title2: Uma uchofoza epulazini uzokwazi ukubona amasimu nezitshalo ezibhaliselwe lelo pulazi nolunye ulwazi oluningi olungakusiza ukuthi usebenzise ngokugcwele impilo yakho yokulima.
home.title3: Qaphela ukuthi Uma ukhetha ukususa ipulazi, yonke imininingwane yalelo pulazi izolahleka.

farm.deleteMsg: Lokhu kuzosusa unomphela wonke amamephu, izitshalo kanye nolwazi olubhaliselwe le nkambu epulazini lakho.

fieldName.selectNameError: sicela ufake igama lenkundla ukuze uqhubeke.
fieldName.farmName: Ake siqale ngokunikeza ipulazi lakho igama.
fieldName.mapField: manje singakwazi ukwenza imephu insimu yakho

navBar.title: sibala isivuno ngokwendawo yensimu yakho kanye nesilinganiso sesifunda sakho
navBar.title2: Isivuno isilinganiso esomile sesisindo, hhayi isisindo ngesikhathi sokuvuna.
navBar.title3: Uma unezitshalo eziningi ensimini lapho-ke isivuno sizoba ngaphansi ngokulinganayo kunalokho okubonisiwe.
navBar.walkText: Chofoza isithonjana senkinobho yokuhamba ngokushesha nje lapho usulungele ukuqala ukuhamba uzungeza insimu yakho.
navBar.walkText1: Ungakhetha ukuhlela ngokubamba izikhonkwane bese uhudulela endaweni efanele
navBar.drawText: Thepha inkinobho yepensela ukuze uqalise. Bese uthepha lapho ufuna ukuthi umugqa wakho womngcele uqale futhi iphinikhodi yakho yokuqala yemephu ephuzi izobhalisa. Iphuzu elilandelayo olithephayo esikrinini lizoxhuma umugqa osuka kuphinikhodi yokuqala. Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma uyithepha izongeza enye iphinikhodi kuleyo ndawo eduze komngcele wakho uze ubuyele lapho uqale khona. Uma ulondoloza, umugqa uzojoyina iphuzu lakho lokuqala ukuze uqedele umumo. Ukuze ususe iphoyinti, chofoza inkinobho yokuhlehlisa futhi iphinikhodi yokugcina oyifakile izokhishwa. Ngemva kwalokho ungaqhubeka nokubeka amaphuzu endaweni yakho uze uqede.
navBar.drawText1: Ungakwazi ukubamba iphinikhodi bese uyihudulela endaweni efanele uma ingalungile. Uma ujabulile ngemephu chofoza londoloza. Ngemva kokulondoloza awukwazi ukushintsha imephu njengoba sizobe senza izibalo ngokusekelwe kule ndawo yezitshalo zakho.
navBar.drawText2: Ukuze ususe iphoyinti, chofoza le nkinobho yokuhlehlisa futhi iphinikhodi yokugcina oyifakile izokhishwa. Ngemva kwalokho ungaqhubeka nokubeka izikhonkwane ezizungeze insimu yakho uze uqede.

fields.question: ingakanani isivuno sakho esiphelele kulesi sitshalo?
fields.title: Isilinganiso esihle silungile, singakusiza ukuthi ugade impumelelo yenkambu yakho njengoba siqhubeka.
fields.saveHarvest: uma ususigcinile lesi sivuno ungakhetha isitshalo esisha ongasitshala kule nsimu.
fields.tempSuggession: Uma unezitshalo eziningi ensimini isivuno sizoba ngaphansi ngokulinganayo.
fields.deleteMsg: Lokhu kuzosusa unomphela lonke ulwazi olubhaliselwe lesi sitshalo ensimini yakho.
fields.fieldtext1: Leli yikhasi lakho lasekhaya lensimu lapho ungaphatha khona izitshalo zakho futhi uthole izeluleko ezinhle kakhulu kochwepheshe be-FarmSmarter.
fields.fieldtext2: Sibala izivuno zezitshalo ngokuya ngendawo yensimu yakho kanye nesivuno esimaphakathi sesifunda sakho. Isivuno siwukulinganisa isisindo esomile, hhayi isisindo ngesikhathi sokuvuna.
fields.fieldtext3: Uma unezitshalo eziningi ensimini lapho-ke isivuno sizoba ngaphansi ngokulinganayo kunalokho okubonisiwe.
fields.fieldtext4: Ukuze uthole ulwazi oluningiliziwe ungasebenzisa iziqondiso zezitshalo zesilimo ngasinye futhi uma usulungele ukuvuna isilimo sakho, vele usazise futhi singarekhoda impumelelo yakho yokuvuna!
fields.cropfailedde: Lesi sitshalo sizosuswa ezitshalweni zakho zasensimini

drawFields.placePin: Beka iphinikhodi ensimini yakho. chofoza isithonjana sepensela ngemva kokubeka iphinikhodi ensimini yakho. Thepha ukuze udwebe uzungeze umngcele wakho wensimu.

walkField.title: I-FarmSmarter izokwakha imephu yakho yensimu njengoba uhamba uzungeze umngcele wakho wensimu.
walkField.content: Uqinisekile? Uma inkambu isilondoloziwe ngeke sikwazi ukushintsha umumo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Ungakwazi ukuvala lokhu futhi uqhubeke nokuhlela uma kudingeka.

cropWelcome.terms: Ngokusazisa ukuthi ukhule ngani ngesizini edlule ensimini. I-FarmSmarter inganikeza isiphakamiso ngokusekelwe endaweni yakho yensimu futhi iqale ukwakha uhlelo lobudlelwano bezitshalo ukusiza ipulazi lakho ukuthi likhiqize kakhudlwana.
cropWelcome.dont: Ungakhathazeki - uma inkambu iyintsha sisengakwazi ukunikeza iziphakamiso, vele usazise!

crops.title: Iziphakamiso zezitshalo zenzelwe ukunikeza izitshalo zakho kanye nomhlabathi wakho isiqalo esinempilo. Ngokushintshanisa izinhlobo zezitshalo ezahlukene singanciphisa ukusetshenziswa kukamanyolo futhi sithuthukise inhlabathi ngokwemvelo.
crops.title2: Uma ufuna ukukhetha okuhlukile isivuno sakho singase singathuthuki.
crops.title3: I-FarmSmarter iphakamisa ukuthi ukhethe esinye salezi zitshalo ukuze ube sethubeni elingcono kakhulu lempumelelo.
crops.noCrops: Akukho ukushintshaniswa kwezitshalo okutholakele kulo mndeni wezitshalo

oldCrop.title: Sicela ufake isinqampuna sakho ebhokisini lombhalo elingezansi, ngeke sikwazi ukunikeza iseluleko esingcono kakhulu ngokushintshanisa kodwa sizokwengeza lokhu ekukhetheni kwethu izitshalo zesikhathi esizayo ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka!
oldCrop.name: igama lesitshalo
oldCrop.selectCrop: khetha isivuno esikhulu osilime kule nsimu ngesizini edlule.

plantPlan.title: I-FarmSmarter isekela ukutshala izitshalo ezifinyelela kwezintathu ensimini eyodwa. Kodwa, unganamathela ngesitshalo esisodwa.
plantPlan.title2: Kubalulekile ukuthi izitshalo eziningi zingaqhudelani ngemisoco, ngakho-ke sihlose ukunikeza iziphakamiso zezitshalo ezihambisanayo ekujikeleziseni izitshalo zakho lapho kungenzeka khona.
plantPlan.question: Ingabe uzotshala esinye isitshalo kule nsimu?

yield.title:
I-FarmSmarter izolandelela ukukhiqiza kwepulazi lakho kusukela kusizini eyodwa kuya kwelandelayo.
Ngokunikeza isivuno sakho sokugcina salo mkhakha singakusiza ukuqapha impilo yensimu yakho ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
yield.title2: Khetha isilinganiso esifanele sesitshalo sakho futhi sizokubalela okunye!
yield.question: ingakanani isivuno sakho esiphelele kulesi sitshalo ngesizini edlule?
yield.fineEstimate: Isilinganiso esihle silungile, singakusiza ukuthi ugade impumelelo yenkambu yakho njengoba siqhubeka.

noCrop.title:
Sicela ufake isinqampuna sakho ebhokisini lombhalo elingezansi, ngeke sikwazi ukukunikeza izeluleko ezingcono kakhulu zokuzungezisa kodwa sizokwengeza lokhu kusilimo sethu esizayo.
ukukhetha ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka!
noCrop.name: igama lesitshalo

fieldPlant.name: igama lesitshalo
fieldPlant.question: Ingabe uzotshala esinye isitshalo kule nsimu?

drawField.title: Chofoza ipensela ukuze uqale imephu yenkundla. Bese uhudula iphinikhodi eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka endaweni yokuqala yomngcele wakho wensimu.
drawField.title2:
Thepha ukuze ukhiqize imigqa eduze komngcele wenkundla. I-FarmSmarter izokwebela umugqa phakathi kwezikhonkwane. Ake uhambe futhi uqhubeke ngale ndlela kuze kube
umngcele wakho wensimu uphelele.

farmAddress.setError: izixhumanisi zepulazi noma ikheli liyadingeka ukuze kuqhutshekwe.
farmAddress.title: Indawo yakho yepulazi izosetshenziswa uma ubhukha ukulethwa noma ukuqoqwa ngohlelo lokusebenza lwe-FarmSmarter.
farmAddress.or: noma faka ikheli lakho lokudiliva epulazini

cropDoc.title: Uma ukuxilongwa kubukeka kungalungile sizokwenza inothi futhi sibuyekeze. Okwamanje ungabona uhlu oluphelele lwezifo lapha:
cropDoc.offlineinfo: Kubonakala sengathi awuxhunyiwe ku-inthanethi njengamanje. Ngokushesha nje lapho usunoxhumano lwe-inthanethi sizokuxhumanisa nelabhulali yethu yezitshalo nezifo ukuze uthole izeluleko ozidingayo.

cropClinic.hello: Sawubona, wamukelekile emtholampilo wezitshalo we-FarmSmarter, ake sibheke inkinga.
cropClinic.let: Leli thuluzi le-AI okwamanje lihlonza izifo zezitshalo ezilinganiselwe ezihlanganisa Ummbila, Amabele, Umdumbula kanye neYam.
cropClinic.photo: Sonke isithombe osilayishayo sizosisiza ukuthi sifunde kabanzi!.
cropClinic.title: ukuthola isithombe esihle kakhulu sokuxilongwa
cropClinic.description: Umtholampilo wethu wezitshalo osebenza nge-AI usebenza ngokubheka izithombe ozinikezayo zesitshalo kanye nezimpawu zaso. Uma isithombe singcono, ukuxilongwa kuzoba nembe kakhulu. Ungakhetha ukuthwebula isithombe ngekhamera yakho noma ulayishe isithombe esivele sikhona kugalari yakho. Uma uthatha isithombe sakho, sicela ugxile engxenyeni yesitshalo ebonisa izimpawu ezisobala kakhulu, isibonelo; iqabunga lonke noma ingxenye yeqabunga ekhombisa isifo, isithelo sonke noma ikhanda lembewu ekhombisa izimpawu. Gwema izithombe ezibonisa isitshalo sonke noma ukuba nezandla neminwe ngendlela yesitshalo noma isifo. Ukukhanya okuhle nokugxila okuhle kuyasiza kakhulu. Uma umtholampilo wezitshalo unikeza umphumela ongalungile sicela usazise njengoba lolu lwazi lusisiza ukuba siwuqeqeshele ikusasa. Njengamanje sihlola izifo eCassava, Yam, Maize kanye neSorgum. Kodwa kuzonezelwa izitshalo nezifo ezengeziwe maduze.

directMsg.title: Ngabe umlayezo oqondile usebenza kanjani?
directMsg.description: Ungathumela umlayezo oqondile kwabanye abasebenzisi. Bangakhetha ukwamukela, ukuziba noma ukuvimba umlayezo wakho.Sicela ube nesizotha futhi uhloniphe. I-FarmSmarter izosusa imilayezo ebikwe njengengalungile futhi ingase ivimbele izaphula-mthetho eziphikelelayo ethuluzini lokuthumela imiyalezo.

community.title: ingxoxo yomphakathi
community.title2: Ngaphambi kokuthi uqale ukuxoxa kule nkundla, ake sikhethe ukufinyelela engxoxweni yakho
community.localMsg: Ibanga elingamamayela angu-20 ukusuka endaweni yakho ebhalisiwe
community.howdesc: Yilapho ongakwazi khona ukuxhumana nabalimi, abahlinzeki, abahlinzeki bezezimali namanye amalungu omphakathi ukuze wabelane ngemibono, uthole iseluleko futhi wakhe Umphakathi we-FarmSmarter oqinile. Ungachofoza esithombeni somunye umsebenzisi ukuze uthole okwengeziwe ngabo futhi uqale ingxoxo eyimfihlo. Bangakhetha ukwamukela, ukuziba noma ukuvimba umlayezo wakho. Sicela ube nesizotha futhi uhloniphe. I-FarmSmarter izosusa imilayezo ebikwe njengengalungile futhi ingase ivimbele izaphula-mthetho eziphikelelayo ethuluzini lokuthumela imiyalezo.
community.blockwarn: lo msebenzisi uzovinjwa engxoxweni yakho eqondile
